answers.answer: i thought about it for my second daughter i even bought a bottle of it but in the end i was to scared so the bottle is still in my bathroom  and she is 2 tomorrow

i never used it no and i dont recemmend it either. your baby will come when its ready to :) plus i heard it makes you poo your pants if your not quick enough to the bathroom lol kinda embarassing lol and i know you said your not thinking about using it. which is a wise choice ive heard its not safe but then again i heard it was. my sisters doctor recemmend that it not be used with her first pregnancy not sure why but it all comes down to your choice

Right... thanks for the responses ladies. I wouldn't use it because my doctor is thinking about inducing me at 37 weeks because of the suspected start of preeclampsia. Is there anyone who has tried it with success? I am just curious.

My midwife used it after her due date, she said it was the worst!  It caused contractions, but not enough to get labor going then her water broke...she was in labor for 48 hours!!  I have heard it can work, but not unless that baby is ready.  So I would just wait, especially if you might get induced.

ive never used it myself.... but i did buy a bottle of it with my first pregnancy, and then chickened out.  i heard that it is NOT recommended to use, but every doctor will tell you something different.
im being medically induced thursday and i defintely was not going to drink that stuff i hear it cleans you out real good but thats about it..it can harm you and your baby by making you dehydrated

question: I was just messin around on the net and came across forum that some women have talked about using castor oil to induce their own labors. I guess they say its safe and that their doctors recommended them to do it. I have heard that it can make the baby pass meconium in-utero. But, they said that the baby can do that with or without taking the castor oil. Has anyone ever tried this? Did it actually work, or just leave you on the toilet all day/night? Don't worry, I am not thinking about using this as I am only 34.3 weeks. I just want to know people's experiences with it. Thanks.
title: Castor Oil to induce labor??
